name: Tappy Battle
description:
Tappy Battle was designed as a mobile game where you strategically place units to fight across the battlefield, tapping to advance units and gain more gold for troops!

Instructions:

  • If you have enough gold, you may drag a unit card out of your hand and onto the first column of the battlefield. 
  • To advance the turn, click the yellow arrow
  • When a unit reaches the enemy "End Zone" a laser will clear that row, and one  enemy health orb will be destroyed.
  • Use the classes and their abilities strategically to overwhelm your opponent and destroy all of their orbs

Classes:

Rogue: (Low Health, Low Damage) This unit is dextrous and sneaky, using shadows to move two squares at a time.

Warrior: (Med. Health, Med. Damage) This is the basic combat unit, good with a sword he can deal moderate damage piercing the two squares in front of him.

Tank: (High Helath, No Damage) The armor-clad tank uses his shield for defense, soaking up damage for the units behind him. When he approaches a friendly unit, he will swap spaces to be on the front line.

Mage: (Med. Health, Med. Damage) The mage prefers to cast from afar, and thus can attack any space directly around him, including into lanes next to him.

Archer: (Med. Health, Med. Damage) The archer deals damage from a range of 3 spaces to a single target. Works best behind a tank!
